title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes               Fees & Passes      Chaco Culture National Historical Park has been approved to increase its entrance fees. The increase will be phased in over a period of three years. With our second increase, beginning January 1, 2016, the park entrance fees will be $16/vehicle; $12/motorcycle; and $8/individual. The next increase will take place January 1, 2017. Park entrance fees will be $20/vehicle; $15/motorcycle; and $10/individual.We honor Interagency Annual, Military, Senior, Every Kid in a Park, and Access Passes. We also sell Interagency Passes.ENTRANCE FEESA park entrance fee is required to enter the park. Vehicle Entrance Fee:  $16.00 for 7 daysThis permit allows all persons traveling in one private, non-commercial vehicle (car/truck/van) to enter the park to visit for up to 7 days from the date of purchase.Motorcycle Entrance Fee:  $12.00 for 7 daysThis permit allows one motorcycle to enter the park to visit for up to 7 days from the date of purchase.Individual Entrance Fee:  $8.00 for 7 daysThis permit allows a single individual traveling on foot, bicycle, or as individuals traveling together in a vehicle as a non-commercial, organized group to enter the park to visit for up to 7 days from the date of purchase.Commercial Entrance Fees are charged per vehicle and are based on the capacity of the vehicle:Vehicle seating capacity of 1-6:  $25.00 plus $8.00 per person age 16 or olderVehicle seating capacity of 7-25:  $40.00Vehicle seating capacity of 26 or more:  $100.00Non-Commercial Group Fees are charged per vehicle and are based on the capacity of the vehicle:Vehicle seating capacity of 15 or less:  $12.00Vehicle seating capacity of 16 or more:  $6.00 per person age 16 or older up to the commercial group fee rate. Interagency passes (e.g. Annual, Senior, or Access) may be used for entry as defined on the back of the pass.ACTIVITY FEESPlease note that these fees are in addition to the park entrance fee.Individual Camping:  Gallo Campground is $15.00 per night per campsite. Campers with Interagency Senior or Access passes pay $7.50 per night per campsite. Reservations for campsites must be made at least 3 days in advance. To reserve a campsite, visit www.recreation.gov or call 1-877-444-6777.Group Camping:  Two group campsites (with a capacity of 10-30 people per campsite) are available at Gallo Campground by reservation. To reserve a group campsite, visit www.recreation.gov or call 1-877-444-6777.
